entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
